file_content.text: Ugh... trying to finish the job? Stay away from me!
You'll pay for that, Jedi!
Serrus was Darth Lachris's special apprentice. I'll have to answer for his death!
Whatever you came for, I'll never--aaarrrghhh!
Praise Scorekeeper. I prefer this one silent.
What the--? Jedi, are you alright?
Come out where I can see you!
Who did that?
The bleeding is moderate, but you need treatment at once.
Let me see to your injuries.
Perhaps you should surrender before your situation gets worse.
Not your day, is it?
Jedi. Good work distracting the bodyguard. Allowed me to find a position.
Hmm. Missed my shot. Step back, please. I need him dead.
Show yourself, Zenith.
Where are you?
Not until he's dead.
You will not commit murder in front of me.
I won't allow this!
This is war. He's the enemy.
This man enslaves Balmorrans. So he dies.
No. He's a wounded captive and must be treated fairly.
Take him prisoner.
Why kill him now when you could ransom him back to the Empire?
He's worth more alive.
Jedi foolishness... okay. I will send men to capture him.
I didn't know. Very well, do as you wish.
I agree. [Step back]
His life means nothing to me.
Go ahead. [Step back]
No! Please! I'm not a--ghhk!
Excellent. Thank you.
I found a safe house where Tai and his colleagues can gather. My people are smuggling him there now.
This is it. I'll go on ahead. Want to hear Tai's plan.
Your drivel just cost Darth Lachris an apprentice, and I'll be blamed!
Serrus! Get this Jedi away from me!
First those terrorists, now a Jedi? Serrus, handle this intruder.
As you command.
Get back, Jedi. I am apprentice to Darth Lachris, vice president of Balmorra, and this man is under my protection.
By what right does your master govern this planet?
A Sith is vice president?
You don't understand, Jedi.
Turn away from this darkness.
Don't try to confuse me. My path is clear.
My family has always lived here, watching Republic interference hold Balmorra back. But Darth Lachris can lead us to glory.
The dark side can only lead to pain and suffering.
No, to destruction.
You know nothing of pain, Jedi. Not yet.
The Empire has enslaved families across Balmorra. Did Darth Lachris spare yours?
What of your relatives?
They... serving the Empire is a privilege. I am... proud they have the chance.
You know this occupation will only do them harm.
I sense your conflict.
You're young and strong. Defy Darth Lachris, and help the people you love.
You can save them.
Never mind this Jedi preaching, Serrus! Kill her!
Serrus! Stop listening to this garbage and kill him!
No. I must--I need time to think on this.
I will stand aside for you, Jedi... find another way to help my people.
If you can't see how wrong that is, there's no hope for you.
I've heard enough. [Attack]
Balmorra's destiny may be bright, but you won't see it.
But you die here. [Attack]
Darth Lachris will soon be training a new apprentice.
Then die. [Attack]
I see. Then let's test your Master's training against mine.
Sharpshooter. Keep your head down.
Here, Jedi. Take my lightsaber. I will seek a better way to help my people.
